title: LFM for Melbourne based LAN tournaments
body:
Currently looking for team members that live in Melbourne and are interested in competing in LAN tournaments. We are looking for a Top, Mid and Support, and preferably players that can play multiple roles.

Requirements:
D5+
Preferably 18+
Flexible, enthusiastic, dedicated
Live in Melbourne/Victoria and can play in LAN tournaments

If you're interested, please fill out this form and reply to the forum below:

*  IGN (in game name):

* Age:
* Rank:
* Role(s):

Shortlisted applicants will be added in game
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
IGN (in game name): Dr FeeL GööD

Age: 25

Rank: currently p2, peaked d5 couple seasons ago
Role(s): jungler/mid

ign: tvan
Age: 19
Rank: d4
role: support
I only peaked G2 in Season 7, disappointing I can't take part. :( Even though I'm in Melbourne!
